Conservative education minister Michael Gove said: In nearly every other developed country in the world children are assessed in a range of core academic subjects at 15 or 16. That is why the Coalition introduced the English Baccalaureate as a measure of performance. Brin will concentrate on developing new products. He's worth$ 15 billion, but Page remains something of a rebel who has always had a disdain for corporate protocol.
